name: MadTracker 2 Module
summary: Learn about .MT2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MadTracker 2 is a music sequencing application for creating music. It comes with various features, including built-in effects, VST plugins, samples, and demo songs.
You can create an MT2 file with MadTracker 2 by following these steps:
Select File → Save or Save As...

description: An MT2 file is an audio module format used by the MadTracker 2 audio tracking program. It contains one or more audio samples, instruments, patterns, and notes that comprise the melody. MT2 files also store metadata, including the version and title of the name and the tracker that created the module.

instructions: You can open an MT2 file with several applications, including MadTracker 2 and Schism Tracker. To open an MT2 file with MadTracker 2, select File → Open.
MadTracker 2 can convert an MT2 file to the following formats:
To convert an MT2 file with MadTracker 2, select File → Export.
